author: mlp_v65n6
content: Thanks for the help... I got validator  up and launched (Prysm) and deposited 32 Eth to the deposit contract using the Ethereum Launchpad Ropsten version (thanks again).  My beacon node (Prysm) is running fine and my EL (Geth) is also fully synced & running fine.   Problem now is my validator appears to be stuck as the deposit is not yet recognized by the beacon chain.  It's confirmed successful on the ropsten etherscan, and when I go here: https://beaconchain.ropsten.ethdevops.io/validators/eth1deposits  - I see my deposit on the eth1 side with my validator public key.  But I'm stuck with this in the validator:  INFO validator: Waiting for deposit to be observed by beacon node pubKey=<my pub key here> status=UNKNOWN_STATUS  -  And Looks like is just not yet recognized on the beacon chain side here: https://beaconchain.ropsten.ethdevops.io/validators/eth2deposits .  Is it just a matter of waiting it out now?  Or has something gone wrong?  Anything else to do but wait to be inducted?

author: stevencook
content:
i don't think the block you made your transaction in will valid until 8 hours  and also then voted upon by majority of proposers for inclusion

author: stevencook
content: this means you should see inclusion of your validator in the next 12-18 hours most likely

author: cbassoy
content: Hello I am a solo stalker and I have some general question about the test nets and the merge.  https://blog.ethereum.org/2022/05/30/ropsten-merge-announcement/ advises to try out the test nets and become familiar with the upgrading process. As I am already validating on mainnet with my Geth+Lighthouse Clients, I would like to try out the upgrades on a different machine with other client instances and not touching my existing setup. Does that make sense? Or is it recommended to stop validating on the mainnet and fully transition to Ropsten?

content: `I would like to try out the upgrades on a different machine with other client instances and not touching my existing setup` fwiw thats exactly what i'm doing. testing a minority client pair on ropsten. been hanging out and stalking ðŸ˜‰  over at ethstaker discord, feel free to shoot me up if you need help
